content: I know I may be pretty naive in how I deal with automatic theorem proving so what follows may be wrong or nonsensical. I had a little exposure to F* for proof-oriented programming as a tool in verified computing and verified cryptographic hardware/software and some libs seem to exist towards those goals. How Does Lean compare to F*? Can I do in Lean cryptography "straightforwardly" (i.e. libraries exist) or the project is more oriented towards formalized mathematics? Thanks.
